alert.note: Alert for North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:39PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Arapahoe, central Denver and southwestern Adams Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 538 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Aurora, or 6 miles east of Denver, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Denver, Aurora, northeastern Centennial, southwestern Denver International Airport, Watkins, Arapahoe Park and Buckley AFB. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
